name: Psalms
description:
psalms is a retro FPS where you fight as a Russian elite mercenary against the hordes of revived and reanimated vampire crusader's. On your quest to uncover the source of the invasion you stumble into some trouble where you need to blast your way out with guns and blades. (still in development lmao)
